author: pipermerriam
content: Selection is purely a function of whether funding is being offered or not.  Anyone may choose to participate independent of funding.  We expect to fund approximately 10 people.

author: pipermerriam
content: Sorry for the confusion.  We'll be sending out the results on Friday (two days from now)

author: Deleted User
content:
what do you mean by the phrase "i intend to participate"
is this for people who have already been accepted?
or is this for people *want* to be accepted?

author: pipermerriam
content: The program is "open" meaning that anyone may participate that chooses to do so.  The "accepted" part only has to do with whether you will be offered funding.  Some people will choose to participate independent of funding, either because they don't need it, or simply because they are interested and able.
